title: Shen E hitbox
body: It feels like shens e hitbox is smaller or is it just me

replies.body: His model is bigger and they accidentally messed with his taunt. There's a post on NA with Rioter responses.

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Kylar Alice,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=N2bq1pv3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-04T03:28:22.677+0000)

> His model is bigger and they accidentally messed with his taunt. There's a post on NA with Rioter responses.
